biotools.summary: SPARK is an efficient method to identify genes with spatial expression pattern. The intended applications are spatially resolved RNA-sequencing from e.g. Spatial Transcriptomics, slide-seq, or in situ gene expression measurements from e.g. seqFISH, MERFISH.
